physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Weight: 22 lb 14 oz (25th percentile), Length: 31.5 in (50th percentile), Head circumference: 19.75 in (95th percentile). Ear examination: normal by pneumatic otoscopy bilaterally.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Sam had a history of recurrent acute otitis media without perforation, with a normal tympanic membrane between episodes. He was on prophylactic antibiotics with no acute otitis media episodes reported for the last month.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: IgG level: 288 mg/dL (borderline low), IgA level: at the lower limit of normal.
